device_effects.title: Effects to include
device_effects.description:
Select effects to be included for device.
These can be added/removed later in integration options.

**Custom effects** can also be created in integration options once the device has been created.
More details [here](https://github.com/BazaJayGee66/homeassistant_cololight/tree/master#extra-configuration)

create_effect.description:
Create a custom effect for the Cololight device.

[Mode values](https://github.com/BazaJayGee66/pycololight/blob/main/MODES.md)

remove_effect.description: Remove saved effects for the Cololight device.

restore_effect.description: Restore default or dynamic effects for the Cololight device

error.invalid_cycle_speed: Cycle speed must be between 1 and 32
